Hi Team, Can anyone assist with center-aligning the values in the attached screen print? Below is my code

<Flex direction={'column'} gap={'medium'} justify={'center'}>
    <Heading>Activity Highlights</Heading>

    <Divider distance ={'extra-large'}/>
    <DescriptionList direction="row">
      <DescriptionListItem label={'CUSTOMER ID'}>
        <Text>{customerID}</Text>
      </DescriptionListItem>
      <DescriptionListItem label={'LAST ACTIVITY DATE'}>
        <Text>{notes_last_updated ? dateTimeFormatter(notes_last_updated) : ""}</Text>
      </DescriptionListItem>
      <DescriptionListItem label={'NEXT ACTIVITY DATE'}>
        <Text>{notes_next_activity_date ? dateTimeFormatter(notes_next_activity_date) : ""}</Text>
      </DescriptionListItem>
      <DescriptionListItem label={'CREATE DATE'}>
        <Text>{createdate ? dateTimeFormatter(createdate) : ""}</Text>
      </DescriptionListItem>
    </DescriptionList>

    <Heading>Revenue Activity</Heading>
    <Divider distance ={'large'}/>
    <DescriptionList direction="row">
      <DescriptionListItem label={'AR STATUS'}>
      {
        isOnHold ? <Text>:large_green_circle:</Text> : <Text>:red_circle:</Text>
      }
      </DescriptionListItem>
      <DescriptionListItem label={'12 MONTH - TOTAL REVENUE'}>
        <Text>{new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', {
    style: 'currency',
    currency: 'USD',
}).format(n12_month___total_revenue___new) }</Text>
      </DescriptionListItem>
      <DescriptionListItem label={'MONTHLY REVENUE TRENDS'}>
        <Text>{monthly_revenue_trends_emojis}</Text>
      </DescriptionListItem>
    </DescriptionList>
    </Flex>
